tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (4)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: His lectures are captivating and shows that he really has a passion for history. There are no in class exams. He assigns four 5-7 page papers and weekly discussions on blackboard. There is a clear grading criteria for the essays. There is a suggested textbook that is not mandatory, but I recommend getting it anyway.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (4)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER  SO MANY PAPERS
comments: 3 papers and 1 take-home final paper. 5 worksheet assignments. 2 textbooks are required (you need to add quotes to your papers, so don\'t bother being cheap by getting an older edition). Attendance is mandatory. No drafts or rewrites. No extra credit. Learn how to do Chicago citation. But definitely one of the better History professors at Hunter.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (4)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I had him for HIST 151 this semester. This man has changed my perspective of what it means to be taught and what it means to have a teacher. Throughout the course, his lectures were inspiring and well dictated! Beware, participation is huge, as is reading from the textbooks and weekly discussions. A great professor, would love to have him again!

stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  SO MANY PAPERS  GET READY TO READ
comments: Really nice professor. His lectures are really interesting and captivating. There\'s a lot of writing involved, but his lectures really help you prepare to write them.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (4)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He is a pretty tough grader. But, the lectures are some of the best I\'ve ever experienced at Hunter. He teaches History like he\'s telling a story - I\'m always at the edge of my seat. He takes time to make the most important points of the lecture clear. Ask questions and participate. I\'m going to miss this class, and I don\'t even like history!

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (4)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  AMAZING LECTURES  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Wish I went to his office hours more. He\'s a really interesting professor. Very helpful, encouraging, and is willing to go out of his way to help you. I\'m really impressed. Best professor I\'ve had so far.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (4)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I have never been a fan of history, but the way he explains it keeps me interested throughout the whole lecture. Just pay attention, make sure you have good writing skills (especially for in class midterm exams), and ask for help when you need it. He does want you to do well and learn.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (4)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: CARING  SO MANY PAPERS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: He is extremely clear and knowledgable about the content. He really wants the class to get a deeper understanding. He is an eloquent speaker and tries his best to make the class enjoyable. Over all a class that i would recommend. Just do all the work and it will be a breeze.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (4)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Class is totally lecture based. Must be able to see the "why?" in all of history. Look through for a deeper understanding. Wants us to be historians, which I totally get. Assigns a term paper, with guidelines, but doesn\'t elaborate fully on every guideline in class. TOUGH grader. Say one thing in the clearest way, and he\'ll say it\'s unclear.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (4)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Professor Murphy is a very tough grader when it comes to tests and the term paper, but he is also kind and willing to help during office hours. Be prepared to study your notes, because the textbook is mainly for the discussion portion of the class.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (4)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Isnt prepared to teach. He always sounds unsure of himself& cuts himself off and jumps to a new sentence making it hard to follow his train of thought. He takes attendance which is odd. Our project was to use only 2 sources from the book, no internet or other booksknowledge which makes no sense and had a page minmax. Has no idea what hes doing

comments: He\'s a great professor. Attendance is extremely important because he lectures the entire class. However, he does base his lectures off of the readings therefore it\'s easy to do well on his exams. He gives thorough reviews and is a fair grader!

comments: great professor. if you take this class make sure you take a lot of notes. hes one of those who just lectures. if you take good notes you are good.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (4)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I honestly despise History, but Prof Murphy made it easy to understand with his detailed slides (which he doesnt post) and he answers questions very clearly. Very sweet and cared about the students. Participation is key! very nice guy!

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (4)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Honestly, his lectures were pretty good. He went a little fast because I took him over the summer but overall I learned a lot from his lectures. Too bad his quizzes were not based on what he told us to study, and at times they were pretty vague. He is a very hard grader and takes off points for the silliest things!!!!

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (5)  Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (4)  SO MANY PAPERS (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: His lectures are uber-important and it pays to listen and actually participate in the class discussions b/c part of your grade is class participation. Also helps to ask for clarifications during his lectures. Really nice guy and his exams aren\'t that bad. The final was a bit tough but he\'s a fair grader.

comments: I had Joseph Murphy as my TA last semester. He was so helpful!!! I enjoyed my History discussion classes! It was a real fun for me. He gives very clear explanations and very organized. The only thing which I feel sorry about is that I had discussion sections just once a week. :-))
